title: After first BLOOD what happened to Teasle? He did live. We see the ambulance wheel him out & he is not mortally wounded. Why was the beef quashed between him & Rambo? Rambo would refer to him later but they never interacted again. Why not? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rambo went to jair breaking rocks. Teasle probably returned home after hospital. After the events of First Blood Part 2, Rambo stated on in Thailand where he remained to live until he returned to Arizona at the end of Rambo 4. Teasle lived near the Rocky Mountains. Other side of the country to Arizona. No reason they would run into each other.

He was cashiered from the sheriff’s dept. in disgrace. He moved away and changed his name to Buddy Kreisler and raised a family. His redemption , still in public service, is documented in a documentary, called Star Of The Family.
